verses.verse: I <S%G4921>commend<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5402>Phebe<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G79>sister<s%>, who <S%G5607>is<s%> a <S%G1249>servant<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2747>Cenchrea<s%>:

<S%G2443>That<s%> you <S%G4327>receive<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, as <S%G516>becomes<s%> <S%G40>saints<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> you <S%G3936>assist<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1722%G99999>in<s%> <S%G302>whatever<s%> <S%G4229>business<s%> she has <S%G5535>need<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846%G99999>she<s%> has <S%G1096>been<s%> a <S%G4368>helper<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%>, <S%G2532%G99999>and<s%> of <S%G1700>myself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>.

<S%G3748>Who<s%> <S%G5294>have<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> laid <S%G5294>down<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5137>necks<s%>: unto <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> give <S%G2168>thanks<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of the <S%G1484>Nations<s%>.

<S%G2532>Likewise<s%> greet the <S%G1577>church<s%> that is <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>. <S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>wellbeloved<s%> <S%G1866>Epaenetus<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G536>firstfruits<s%> of <S%G882>Achaia<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G2267>Herodion<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4773>kinsman<s%>. <S%G782>Greet<s%> them that <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3488>the<s%> household of <S%G3488>Narcissus<s%>, which <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G3870>beg<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G80>brothers<s%>, <S%G4648>mark<s%> them which <S%G4160>cause<s%> <S%G1370>divisions<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4625>offenses<s%> contrary <S%G3844>to<s%> the <S%G1322>teaching<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> have <S%G3129>learned<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1578%G99999>avoid<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> they that are <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G2836>belly<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> good <S%G5542>words<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> fair <S%G2129>speeches<s%> <S%G1818>deceive<s%> the <S%G2588>hearts<s%> of the <S%G172>simple<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5218>obedience<s%> has become <S%G864>known<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5463>men<s%>. I am glad <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G5213>your<s%> <S%G1909>behalf<s%>: but <S%G1161>yet<s%> I would <S%G2309>have<s%> <S%G5209%G99999>you<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> that which is <S%G18>good<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G185>simple<s%> <S%G1519>concerning<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> to him that has the <S%G1410>power<s%> to <S%G4741>establish<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2782>preaching<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of the <S%G3466>mystery<s%>, which was kept <S%G4601%G99999>secret<s%> since the world <S%G166>began<s%>,

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> is made <S%G5319>manifest<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G1124>scriptures<s%> of the <S%G4397>prophets<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G2003>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>the<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, made <S%G1107>known<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%>:

To the <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3739>be<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%>. <S%G1577>Amen<s%>. Written to the Romans from Corinthus, and sent by Phebe servant of the church at Cenchrea.
